name: Vigoroth

evolution.description: Vigoroth can evolve into Slaking at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Wild Monkey Pokémon. Vigoroth is always itching and agitated to go on a wild rampage. It simply can't tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This Pokémon's stress level rises if it can't be moving constantly.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be put to sleep.
